item.title: Autotrophic and heterotrophic metabolism of microbial planktonic communities in an oligotrophic coastal marine ecosystem: seasonal dynamics and episodic events
Testing the direct effect of CO|2| concentration on a bloom the coccolithophorid Emiliania huxleyi in mesocosm experiments
